item.title: CVE-2024-31928|2024-04-11T12:28:09.464Z -- wp%20darko -- top%20bar
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation ('Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in WP Darko Top Bar allows Stored XSS.This issue affects Top Bar: from n/a through 3.0.5.
